page.title: 12Clubs and Societies
page.content: This area,{Nantyffyllon,}has very few {clubs and Societies.}If you go out of this area, to{Maesteg, }you will find lots more clubs and Societies, but I am not saying there are no clubs in this area. For instance in Nantyffyllon we have{Brownies and Cubs held in Nantyffyllon school. In Nantyffyllon library there is a disco, and sometimes bingo, for those who are interested. In Maesteg the{Red Cross Society}is held and the{Youth Red Cross {Society.}In Maesteg there are{Girl {Guides}and also{Scouts.}The Ladies choir meets in Maesteg. In the clinic in Caerau there is a{Housebound club. Our area Nantyffyllon is a nice place, but really there should be more clubs and Societies.
